subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Catriona Matthew of Scotland and Brittany Lincicome of the United States shared a one-stroke lead yesterday after the third round at the Scandinavian TPC in Loddekopinge, Sweden. The tournament host, Annika Sorenstam, again played poorly and was nine strokes back.
